Row.Text: 我会一直前行，直到黎明到来
风啊，回应我吧！
要与「罪人」共舞一曲吗？
身为蒙德城第一富豪，风度翩翩的迪卢克总是以完美的贵公子形象示人。然而他真实的一面，是秉承坚定信念的战士，他那「不惜一切守护蒙德」的意志犹如火焰般炽热，令他能以恐怖的攻势，毫不留情地将一切敌人击溃。
身为西风骑士团的代理团长，琴一直忠于职守，为人们带来安宁。虽然并非天赋异禀，但通过刻苦训练，如今的她已然能够独当一面。当风魔龙的威胁开始临近，这位可靠的代理团长早已做好了准备，誓要守护蒙德。
优菈——常年在外作战的「浪花骑士」，反叛的旧贵族末裔。[NEWLINE]生于旧日宗室，身负罪恶血脉之人，的确需要独特的处世技巧，才能在偏见的高墙下安然行走。当然，这并不妨碍她与家族决裂，作为卓越的「浪花骑士」，在外游猎蒙德的敌人，完成她那意义独特的「复仇」。
守护之誓
抗争之志
游猎的经验
获得一次升级
蒲公英之风
消灭一个单位时恢复50点生命值。受伤的单位每回合额外恢复10点，
光潮的幻象
只有相邻敌军单位才能发现该单位
「游击小队」是西风骑士团第四小队。作为西风骑士团「游击小队」的队长与声名显赫的「浪花骑士」，优菈长期率领「游击小队」在外巡逻。
迪卢克，坐拥蒙德大半酒业的贵公子，财力、人望、能力都令人无法小觑。
酒馆是情报集中流通的地方。作为蒙德酒业的控制者，拥有强大的情报搜集能力，更容易的获得其他文明的动向，并将情报优势转为其扫平对蒙德威胁的助力，
琴能为己方的军事单位提供助力。
琴领导的西风骑士团能在战斗中治疗自身，并且拥有更高的回复力，和移动力。在蒲公英之风的助力下，带领蒙德走向胜利
优菈常年带领游击小队在外追猎魔物和深渊教团，不仅剑术精湛，更兼备谋略与胆识。
游击骑士的职责是自由狩猎敌军，或者在侧面战场牵制敌人，由于常年带领游击小队在外追猎魔物和深渊教团，积攒了大量的作战经验。优菈会随身携带一支精巧的骨哨。每当她吹起骨哨，四周便会响起惟妙惟肖的海浪声。 她所带领的队伍，执勤区域临近海岸。海浪声是一大助力，能干扰敌方判断。
蒙德「晨曦骑士」莱艮芬德的后代，晨曦酒庄前代庄主克利普斯老爷的儿子。
10岁获得神之眼，14岁加入西风骑士团，之后担任了骑兵队长。迪卢克18岁成人礼那天，父亲使用邪眼的力量与魔龙乌萨战斗，保护蒙德而死。不满于当时骑士团的督察长伊洛克的处置，迪卢克退出了骑士团。当晚，义弟凯亚坦白了自己坎瑞亚间谍的身份。兄弟二人展开了全力的剑斗。
之后他一直为了查明父亲所用邪眼的真相而奔走，找到幕后黑手愚人众。在捣毁一处窝点后，迪卢克引出了愚人众的执行官，险些丧命（据官方漫画讲述，当时的迪卢克是同时应对愚人众的多位执行官，而并非与第十一位执行官单挑），被北大陆的地下情报组织救下，了解了部分世界的真相。
愚人众的「博士」造访蒙德时期，迪卢克约21岁，化身暗夜英雄的迪卢克与他短暂交锋，被「博士」看破了使用的邪眼。在骚动的最后，迪卢克毁掉了自己继承的邪眼，回到了蒙德。
十五岁那年，琴获授“蒲公英骑士”，并在建立骑士团、重振蒙德的初代蒲公英骑士温妮莎在生命结束时种在风起地的巨树驱散了疑虑与不安。所以，每当感到疲惫动摇，琴便会来到这棵树下，接受风的洗礼。风洗净她的困顿，令她重拾前行的力量。风起地的神树是初代“狮牙骑士”道路的终点。同时，也是“蒲公英骑士”琴的起点。
尽管熟读历史典籍，尽管身戴“蒲公英骑士”之名，尽管成为了深受信赖的代理团长，琴依然十分中意恋爱小说。并非因为在训练与勤务中虚度了少女年华，也不是因为父母婚姻有裂痕。琴仅仅是向往故事所描绘的两情相悦，向往蛛丝般精妙又脆弱的情感。身为骑士，凡事要以蒙德城和西风骑士团为最优先。但要是有时间，琴也想去《少女薇拉的忧郁》中的名场景黎明前的誓言岬看看
琴从小就很喜欢诗歌《温妮莎传奇》，阅览传奇故事和史书上的英雄事迹是她一直以来的爱好。优秀的骑士不能挑食，琴没有讨厌的食物 ，最喜欢的食物是猫尾酒馆的披萨 。琴特色料理和喜好的食物相同，也是披萨，吃一片就能大大地振奋精神。
作为西风骑士团「游击小队」的队长与声名显赫的「浪花骑士」，优菈长期率部在外巡逻，斩获过诸多功勋。驻扎在高山深涧中的骑士们时常成为魔物的突袭目标，优菈能用最为迅速的支援排除险情，化解危机，她也屡次率队主动进攻，捣毁深渊教团的据点，将阴谋扼杀于萌芽状态。
可优菈的身世尤为特殊，诸多矛盾盘根错节——她是劳伦斯家族的末裔，被蒙德民众视为罪人之血的具象。这样的她却在多年前与家族决裂，加入了西风骑士团。碍于难以消除的偏见，优菈并未得到公正的对待。在蒙德民众眼里，她始终是「外人」，甚至——「危险人物」。
需要什么就直说。报销问题找埃泽。
要扫荡罪恶的话，我必须独自行走在长夜之中。
想试试隐藏菜单吗？
寒暄就免了。一切平安就好。
呵…是我多言了。
哼…没什么可多谈的，道路不同罢了。
真正应当消灭的敌人，孕育罪恶的「黑暗」本身，需要用刀剑以外的方法去斩断…
嗯，下次见。
没什么…我不喜欢
这样的合作，对我来说也算新奇。
前方会有什么？我很少会思考这种问题。我必须前进，不论有谁阻挡在我面前。
雨吗，可惜洗刷不了你那污秽的心。（谴责你）
蒙德城的迪卢克，应约而来。闲聊恕不奉陪，如果你是想做一番大事，我倒有点兴致。
只要坚信自己的道路，就无所谓天气是晴是雨。
嗯，下次见。
难得有这份闲暇，跟我下局棋吧。
为了达成目标，力量是必须的。
你已经证明了你的决心。那么，也让你见证一下我的意志吧。
你会付出代价。
败者…没有借口…
就当是聚沙成塔。
蒙德的土地浸润着风神的恩泽，就不需要这点微不足道的收益了。
你还不赖。无论是对弈还是战斗，都不乏让人眼前一亮的表现。
在「黎明」到来之前，必须有人稍微照亮「黑暗」…
但能把我逼到这个地步，还真是不简单啊。
从今往后，我的荣誉与忠诚将与你同在！
你做得还不够好。
我会全力帮助你，当然，如果你的方向偏离了正义，我也会毫不犹豫地指出。
从今往后，我的荣誉与忠诚将与你同在！
一定是我还不够努力。绝对不能松懈，不能辜负西风骑士团和蒙德。
为蒙德而战，为自由而战——我，在所不辞。
只要风不停歇，我就不会停下脚步。
从我个人角度而言，我也很荣幸能与这样的同伴共事。
让人难以放心。
或许可以和你聊聊
身为代理团长，我必须未雨绸缪。
你的方向偏离了正义。（谴责你）
从今往后，我的荣誉与忠诚将与你同在！
行动起来吧，我们不该在这里停留。
走吧，前往下一个目标！
好，现在开始处理任务吧。
我谨代表西风骑士团，向你致意。
我以此剑起誓，必将胜利献给你。
我肩负着西风骑士团的信任，还有蒙德民众的期待。为此，我不能松懈。
我…还不够称职…
相信你也能从中受益。
这个条件…还有很多欠缺
算是暂时获得了平静。
风之神，请指引我们。
风啊，请指引我前进的道路。
和你结仇是件走运的事，我得紧紧咬住你不放了。
怎么想我们都不合拍。
你还会和我结下更多仇的，不如就等到哪天一并清算吧，这样能省掉不少麻烦。
也许是十年后，二十年后…放心，我不会忘的。在那之前，你可要生龙活虎，平安无事啊。
听说我是劳伦斯家的人，摆谱的、挑衅的、明着暗着使绊子的，就从各种地方冒出来了，唉，还让不让人好好喝酒了？
哦？这是对我的挑战吗。我接受了。
你一直执迷不悟，甚至继续荼毒人民，就该被我亲手抹杀。
嗯，大多能派上用场。
我可不乐意。
既然成为了西风骑士，基本工作还是要尽职的。
你这家伙，是在报复我吗？
下个目标就是你，你也别想逃。（谴责你）
西风骑士团，游击小队队长，「浪花骑士」优菈·劳伦斯，向你致以问候…
西风剑术？想和我学两手吗？
视野不错！
登上高地，就能将周围的敌情尽收眼底。
有人劝过我低声下气，谨言慎行，说这样也许能获得谅解，但他们会这么想，只是因为他们没当过真正的「罪人」。
送你一个特制骨哨，跟我学学吹奏的方法吧。等到我向你报仇的那天，你可以试试，用这枚骨哨干扰我，拖延时间，挣扎得更有趣一些吧。
退回去，否则你我要正式接敌了…
罪人的结局吗…
嗯，大多能派上用场。
这怎么像话！这些仇，我都记下了！
不赖嘛！
以眼还眼！以霜还怨！
赏你一个不算难看的败北。
I will keep going until dawn.
Wind, respond to me!
Want to dance with "sinners"?

As the richest man in Mondstadt, the personable Diluc always presents himself as a perfect nobleman. However, his true side is a warrior with strong convictions, and his will to "protect Mondstadt at all costs" is as hot as a flame, allowing him to ruthlessly defeat all enemies with a terrifying offensive.

As the acting head of the Favoniu Knights, Jean has always been faithful to his duty and brought peace to people. Although she is not very talented, through hard training, she is now able to stand alone. When the threat of the Wind Demon Dragon began to approach, the reliable acting commander was already ready to protect Mondstadt.

Eula - The "Knight of the Waves" who fights outside for many years, the last descendant of the rebellious old nobility.[NEWLINE]People born in the old clan and with a sinful bloodline do need unique skills in order to walk safely under the walls of prejudice. Of course, this does not prevent her from breaking with the family and completing her unique "revenge" as a brilliant "Splash Knight" to hunt Mond's enemies outside.
Oath Of Protection
Will Of Resistance
Experience in Hunting
Get an Promotion
Dandelian Breeze
When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.Injured units recover an additional 5 points per turn.
Shimmering Wave
Only adjacent enemy units can discover the u Recon Company

The "Guerrilla Squad" is the fourth squad of the Favoniu Knights. As the captain of the "Recon Company" of the Knights of Favoniu Knights and the famous "Knight of the Waves", Yura has long led the "Recon Company" to patrol outside.
Diluc, the noble son who owns most of Mond's wine industry, has financial strength, popularity, and ability to be underestimated.

Taverns are places where intelligence circulates centrally. As the controller of the Mond liquor industry, he has a strong intelligence gathering ability, it is easier to obtain the movements of other civilizations, and he turns his intelligence advantage into his help to eliminate the threat to Mond.
Jean can provide assistance to its own military units.
The Knights of the Favonius, led by Jean, can heal themselves in battle and have higher recovery and movement power. With the help of dandelion wind, lead Mond to victory
Eula leads guerrilla teams to hunt monsters and the Abyss Sect outside all year round, not only superb in swordsmanship, but also with strategy and courage.

The duty of the recon compny is to hunt the enemy freely, or contain the enemy in the side battlefield, because they have accumulated a lot of combat experience by leading the guerrilla team to hunt monsters and the Abyss Sect outside for many years. Eula carries a delicate bone whistle with her. Whenever she blows her bone whistle, the sound of waves sounds all around. The team she leads is close to the coast. The sound of the waves is a big help and can interfere with enemy judgment.
Descendant of Mond "Knight of the Dawn" Legon Fender, son of the former owner of the Château Dawn, Lord Clipps.

He received the Eye of God at the age of 10 and joined the Knights of the Favonius at the age of 14, after which he served as a cavalry captain. On the day of Diluc's 18th birthday bar mitzvah, his father used the power of the Evil Eye to fight the demon dragon Usa and protect Mond and die. Dissatisfied with the disposition of the Order's Inspector General at the time, Elok, Diluc withdrew from the Order. That night, the righteous brother Kaiya confessed his identity as a Canrea spy. The two brothers engaged in an all-out sword fight.

Since then, he has been running to find out the truth about the evil eye used by his father, and find the fools behind the scenes. After destroying a den, Diluc lures the executive of the Fools, nearly dies (according to the official cartoon, Diluc was the same number of executives who dealt with the Fools at the time, not the eleventh executive), was rescued by the underground intelligence organization of the North Continent, and learned the truth about part of the world.

During the visit of the "Doctor" of the Fools, Diluc was about 21 years old, and Diluc, who turned into a hero of the night, briefly confronted him, and was seen by the "Doctor" to use the evil eye. At the end of the commotion, Diluc destroys the evil eye he inherited and returns to Mond.

At the age of fifteen, Jean was awarded the title of "Dandelion Knight", and Vanessa, the first dandelion knight who founded the Order and revived Mond, dispelled doubts and uneasiness at the end of her life by planting a giant tree on the wind. Therefore, whenever he felt tired and shaken, Jean would come under this tree and be baptized by the wind. The wind washed away her difficulties and regained her strength to move forward. The Divine Tree of the Wind Rising Earth is the end of the road of the original "Lion's Tooth Knight". At the same time, it is also the starting point of the "Dandelion Knight" piano.

Despite being familiar with historical texts, wearing the name "Dandelion Knight", and despite becoming a trusted acting leader, Jean still loves romance novels. It is not because of the wasted girlhood in training and work, nor because of the rift in the marriage of the parents. Jean just yearns for the two loves depicted in the story, and yearns for the delicate and fragile emotions like spider silk. As a knight, Mondstadt and the Knights of the Favonius are the highest priority in everything. But if she has time, Jean also wants to visit Cape Oath, the famous scene in "The Melancholy of the Girl Vera", before dawn

Jean has loved the poem "The Legend of Winessa" since she was a child, and reading legends and heroic deeds in history books has always been her hobby. Good knights can't be picky eaters, Jean has no nasty food, and his favorite food is pizza at Cattail Tavern. Koto's specialty dishes are the same as your favorite food, and they are also pizzas, so eating one slice can greatly lift your spirits.

As the captain of the "guerrilla squad" of the Favonius Knights and the famous "Wave Knight", Yura has led his troops to patrol outside for a long time and has won many merits. The knights stationed in the deep mountains and streams often become the target of monsters, and Yura can use the fastest support to eliminate dangers and defuse crises, and she has repeatedly led her team to take the initiative to attack, destroying the strongholds of the Abyss Sect and nipping the conspiracy in the bud.

But Youra's background is particularly special, and many contradictions are intertwined - she is the last descendant of the Lawrence family, and is regarded by the people of Mond as the embodiment of the blood of sinners. In this way, she broke with the family many years ago and joined the Knights of the Favonius. Due to the prejudice that is difficult to eliminate, Eula is not treated fairly. In the eyes of the people of Mond, she has always been an "outsider", even - a "dangerous person".
Just say what you need. Reimbursement questions to Ezer.
To sweep away sin, I must walk alone in the long night.
Want to try hidden menus?
Greetings are waived. It's all right.
Scold... I'm talking too much.
Hum... There is nothing to talk about, the path is different.
The enemy that should really be destroyed, the "darkness" itself that breeds sin, needs to be cut off by means other than the sword...
Well, see you next time.
It's nothing... I don't like it
This kind of cooperation is also a novelty to me.
What will lie ahead? I rarely think about this kind of question. I must move forward, no matter who stands in my way.
Rain, it's a pity that it can't wash away your filthy heart. (Denouncee you)
Diluc of Mondstadtt, came at the request. Small talk is not allowed, if you want to do something big, I am a little interested.
As long as you believe in your path, it doesn't matter if the weather is sunny or rainy.
Well, see you next time.
It's rare to have this leisure, play chess with me.
In order to achieve the goal, strength is necessary.
You have proven your resolve. Well, let you witness my will.
You will pay the price.
Loser... No excuses...
It's like gathering sand into a tower.
The land of Mond is soaked with the grace of the wind god, and there is no need for this trivial gain.
You're not bad yet. Whether it's a game or a battle, there is no shortage of eye-catching performances.
Before the "dawn" comes, someone must illuminate the "darkness" a little...
But it's really not easy to push me to this point.
From now on, my honor and loyalty will be with you!
You're not good enough.
I will do my best to help you, and of course, if your direction deviates from justice, I will not hesitate to point it out.
From now on, my honor and loyalty will be with you!
It must be that I haven't tried hard enough. There must be no slack, no failure to live up to the Knights of Favonius and Mond.
Fight for Mond, fight for freedom - I, do not give up.
As long as the wind doesn't stop, I won't stop.
From a personal point of view, I am also honored to work with such peers.
It's hard to reassure.
Maybe I can talk to you
As acting head of the mission, I have to plan ahead.
Your direction is straying from justice. (Denouce you)
From now on, my honor and loyalty will be with you!
Let's get moving, we shouldn't stop here.
Let's go, head to the next goal!
Okay, now let's get to work.
On behalf of the Knights of the Favonius, I greet you.
I swear by this sword, and I will offer you victory.
I carry the trust of the Knights of the Favonius and the expectations of the people of Mond. For that, I can't relax.
I... Not competent enough ...
I'm sure you can benefit from it too.
This condition... There is still a lot to be desired
It was a temporary calm.
God of the wind, please guide us.
Wind, please show me the way forward.
It's lucky to have a vendetta against you, and I'll have to hold on to you.
No matter how you think about it, we are not in tune.
You will have more enmity with me, so it's better to wait until one day to settle together, which will save you a lot of trouble."
Maybe ten years from now, twenty years from now ... Rest assured, I won't forget. Until then, you will be alive and sound.
Heard that I am a member of the Lawrence family, posing, provocative, openly and secretly tripping, and I came out of various places, alas, and let people not drink well?
Oh? Is this a challenge for me. I accepted.
If you have been obsessed with it, and even continue to poison the people, you should be wiped out by my own hands.
Well, mostly can come in handy.
I'm not happy.
Since he has become a knight of the Favonius, the basic work still has to be dutiful.
Are you taking revenge on me?
The next target is you, and you don't want to escape. (Denounc you)
Knights of the Favonius, leader of the guerrilla squad, "Wave Knight" Eula Lawrence, greetings to you...
Favonius Swordsmanship? Want to learn two hands with me?
Nice view!
Climb the heights and you'll have a panoramic view of the enemies around you.

Some people have advised me to keep my breath low and be cautious in my words and actions, saying that this may lead to forgiveness, but they will think so only because they have not really been "sinners."
Send you a special bone whistle and learn how to play with me. When I avenge you, you can try to use this bone whistle to interfere with me, delay time, and struggle more interestingly.
Go back, or you and I will officially take over the enemy...
The end of the sinner...
Well, mostly can come in handy.
Well, mostly can come in handy.
Not bad!
An eye for an eye! Repay the grievances with frost!
Reward you with a defeat that is not too ugly.
我會一直前行，直到黎明到來
風啊，回應我吧！
要與「罪人」共舞一曲嗎？
身為蒙德城第一富豪，風度翩翩的迪盧克總是以完美的貴公子形象示人。然而他真實的一面，是秉承堅定信念的戰士，他那「不惜一切守護蒙德」的意志猶如火焰般熾熱，令他能以恐怖的攻勢，毫不留情地將一切敵人擊潰。
身為西風騎士團的代理團長，琴一直忠於職守，為人們帶來安寧。雖然並非天賦異稟，但通過刻苦訓練，如今的她已然能夠獨當一面。當風魔龍的威脅開始臨近，這位元可靠的代理團長早已做好了準備，誓要守護蒙德。
優菈——常年在外作戰的「浪花騎士」，反叛的舊貴族末裔。[NEWLINE]生於舊日宗室，身負罪惡血脈之人，的確需要獨特的處世技巧，才能在偏見的高牆下安然行走。當然，這並不妨礙她與家族決裂，作為卓越的「浪花騎士」，在外游獵蒙德的敵人，完成她那意義獨特的「復仇」。
守護之誓
抗爭之志
遊獵的經驗
獲得一次升級
蒲公英之風
消滅一個單位時恢復50點生命值。受傷的單位每回合額外恢復10點，
光潮的幻象
只有相鄰敵軍單位才能發現該單位
「遊擊小隊」是西風騎士團第四小隊。作為西風騎士團「遊擊小隊」的隊長與聲名顯赫的「浪花騎士」，優菈長期率領「遊擊小隊」在外巡邏。
迪盧克，坐擁蒙德大半酒業的貴公子，財力、人望、能力都令人無法小覷。
酒館是情報集中流通的地方。作為蒙德酒業的控制者，擁有強大的情報搜集能力，更容易的獲得其他文明的動向，並將情報優勢轉為其掃平對蒙德威脅的助力，
琴能為己方的軍事單位提供助力。
琴領導的西風騎士團能在戰鬥中治療自身，並且擁有更高的回復力，和移動力。在蒲公英之風的助力下，帶領蒙德走向勝利
優菈常年帶領遊擊小隊在外追獵魔物和深淵教團，不僅劍術精湛，更兼備謀略與膽識。
遊擊騎士的職責是自由狩獵敵軍，或者在側面戰場牽制敵人，由於常年帶領遊擊小隊在外追獵魔物和深淵教團，積攢了大量的作戰經驗。優菈會隨身攜帶一支精巧的骨哨。每當她吹起骨哨，四周便會響起惟妙惟肖的海浪聲。 她所帶領的隊伍，執勤區域臨近海岸。海浪聲是一大助力，能干擾敵方判斷。
蒙德「晨曦騎士」萊艮芬德的後代，晨曦酒莊前代莊主克利普斯老爺的兒子。
10歲獲得神之眼，14歲加入西風騎士團，之後擔任了騎兵隊長。迪盧克18歲成人禮那天，父親使用邪眼的力量與魔龍烏薩戰鬥，保護蒙德而死。不滿於當時騎士團的督察長伊洛克的處置，迪盧克退出了騎士團。當晚，義弟凱亞坦白了自己坎瑞亞間諜的身份。兄弟二人展開了全力的劍鬥。
之後他一直為了查明父親所用邪眼的真相而奔走，找到幕後黑手愚人眾。在搗毀一處窩點後，迪盧克引出了愚人眾的執行官，險些喪命（據官方漫畫講述，當時的迪盧克是同時應對愚人眾的多位執行官，而並非與第十一位執行官單挑），被北大陸的地下情報組織救下，瞭解了部分世界的真相。
愚人眾的「博士」造訪蒙德時期，迪盧克約21歲，化身暗夜英雄的迪盧克與他短暫交鋒，被「博士」看破了使用的邪眼。在騷動的最後，迪盧克毀掉了自己繼承的邪眼，回到了蒙德。
十五歲那年，琴獲授“蒲公英騎士”，並在建立騎士團、重振蒙德的初代蒲公英騎士溫妮莎在生命結束時種在風起地的巨樹驅散了疑慮與不安。所以，每當感到疲憊動搖，琴便會來到這棵樹下，接受風的洗禮。風洗淨她的困頓，令她重拾前行的力量。風起地的神樹是初代“獅牙騎士”道路的終點。同時，也是“蒲公英騎士”琴的起點。
儘管熟讀歷史典籍，儘管身戴“蒲公英騎士”之名，儘管成為了深受信賴的代理團長，琴依然十分中意戀愛小說。並非因為在訓練與勤務中虛度了少女年華，也不是因為父母婚姻有裂痕。琴僅僅是嚮往故事所描繪的兩情相悅，嚮往蛛絲般精妙又脆弱的情感。身為騎士，凡事要以蒙德城和西風騎士團為最優先。但要是有時間，琴也想去《少女薇拉的憂鬱》中的名場景黎明前的誓言岬看看
琴從小就很喜歡詩歌《溫妮莎傳奇》，閱覽傳奇故事和史書上的英雄事蹟是她一直以來的愛好。優秀的騎士不能挑食，琴沒有討厭的食物 ，最喜歡的食物是貓尾酒館的披薩 。琴特色料理和喜好的食物相同，也是披薩，吃一片就能大大地振奮精神。
作為西風騎士團「遊擊小隊」的隊長與聲名顯赫的「浪花騎士」，優菈長期率部在外巡邏，斬獲過諸多功勳。駐紮在高山深澗中的騎士們時常成為魔物的突襲目標，優菈能用最為迅速的支持排除險情，化解危機，她也屢次率隊主動進攻，搗毀深淵教團的據點，將陰謀扼殺于萌芽狀態。
可優菈的身世尤為特殊，諸多矛盾盤根錯節——她是勞倫斯家族的末裔，被蒙德民眾視為罪人之血的具象。這樣的她卻在多年前與家族決裂，加入了西風騎士團。礙於難以消除的偏見，優菈並未得到公正的對待。在蒙德民眾眼裡，她始終是「外人」，甚至——「危險人物」。
需要什麼就直說。報銷問題找埃澤。
要掃蕩罪惡的話，我必須獨自行走在長夜之中。
想試試隱藏菜單嗎？
寒暄就免了。一切平安就好。
呵…是我多言了。
哼…沒什麼可多談的，道路不同罷了。
真正應當消滅的敵人，孕育罪惡的「黑暗」本身，需要用刀劍以外的方法去斬斷…
嗯，下次見。
沒什麼…我不喜歡
這樣的合作，對我來說也算新奇。
前方會有什麼？我很少會思考這種問題。我必須前進，不論有誰阻擋在我面前。
雨嗎，可惜洗刷不了你那污穢的心。（譴責你）
蒙德城的迪盧克，應約而來。閒聊恕不奉陪，如果你是想做一番大事，我倒有點興致。
只要堅信自己的道路，就無所謂天氣是晴是雨。
嗯，下次見。
難得有這份閒暇，跟我下局棋吧。
為了達成目標，力量是必須的。
你已經證明了你的決心。那麼，也讓你見證一下我的意志吧。
你會付出代價。
敗者…沒有藉口…
就當是聚沙成塔。
蒙德的土地浸潤著風神的恩澤，就不需要這點微不足道的收益了。
你還不賴。無論是對弈還是戰鬥，都不乏讓人眼前一亮的表現。
在「黎明」到來之前，必須有人稍微照亮「黑暗」…
但能把我逼到這個地步，還真是不簡單啊。
從今往後，我的榮譽與忠誠將與你同在！
你做得還不夠好。
我會全力幫助你，當然，如果你的方向偏離了正義，我也會毫不猶豫地指出。
從今往後，我的榮譽與忠誠將與你同在！
一定是我還不夠努力。絕對不能鬆懈，不能辜負西風騎士團和蒙德。
為蒙德而戰，為自由而戰——我，在所不辭。
只要風不停歇，我就不會停下腳步。
從我個人角度而言，我也很榮幸能與這樣的同伴共事。
讓人難以放心。
或許可以和你聊聊
身為代理團長，我必須未雨綢繆。
你的方向偏離了正義。（譴責你）
從今往後，我的榮譽與忠誠將與你同在！
行動起來吧，我們不該在這裡停留。
走吧，前往下一個目標！
好，現在開始處理任務吧。
我謹代表西風騎士團，向你致意。
我以此劍起誓，必將勝利獻給你。
我肩負著西風騎士團的信任，還有蒙德民眾的期待。為此，我不能鬆懈。
我…還不夠稱職…
相信你也能從中受益。
這個條件…還有很多欠缺
算是暫時獲得了平靜。
風之神，請指引我們。
風啊，請指引我前進的道路。
和你結仇是件走運的事，我得緊緊咬住你不放了。
怎麼想我們都不合拍。
你還會和我結下更多仇的，不如就等到哪天一併清算吧，這樣能省掉不少麻煩。
也許是十年後，二十年後…放心，我不會忘的。在那之前，你可要生龍活虎，平安無事啊。
聽說我是勞倫斯家的人，擺譜的、挑釁的、明著暗著使絆子的，就從各種地方冒出來了，唉，還讓不讓人好好喝酒了？
哦？這是對我的挑戰嗎。我接受了。
你一直執迷不悟，甚至繼續荼毒人民，就該被我親手抹殺。
嗯，大多能派上用場。
我可不樂意。
既然成為了西風騎士，基本工作還是要盡職的。
你這傢伙，是在報復我嗎？
下個目標就是你，你也別想逃。（譴責你）
西風騎士團，遊擊小隊隊長，「浪花騎士」優菈·勞倫斯，向你致以問候…
西風劍術？想和我學兩手嗎？
視野不錯！
登上高地，就能將周圍的敵情盡收眼底。
有人勸過我低聲下氣，謹言慎行，說這樣也許能獲得諒解，但他們會這麼想，只是因為他們沒當過真正的「罪人」。
送你一個特製骨哨，跟我學學吹奏的方法吧。等到我向你報仇的那天，你可以試試，用這枚骨哨干擾我，拖延時間，掙扎得更有趣一些吧。
退回去，否則你我要正式接敵了…
罪人的結局嗎…
嗯，大多能派上用場。
這怎麼像話！這些仇，我都記下了！
不賴嘛！
以眼還眼！以霜還怨！
賞你一個不算難看的敗北。
